vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.31
§ Azmaveth = "strong unto death"
n pr m
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a descendant of Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan and grandson of king Saul
3) a Benjamite, father of Jeziel and Pelet who were two of David's men who joined him at Ziklag
4) overseer of the royal treasures in the reign of David
n pr loc
5) a place in Benjamin; also 'Beth-azmeveth'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   guerrero; en tiempos de David; (b)   hijo de Jará, Joadá; tribu de Benjamín; (c)   padre de Jeziel y Pélet, guerreros; en tiempos de David; (d)   hijo de Adiel; funcionario; en tiempos de David; (e) בֵּית־עַזְמָוֶת   lugar; territorio de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞斯瑪威 或 押斯瑪弗 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "一生剛毅, 至死方休"
陽性專有名詞
1) 大衛王的大能勇士之一(撒下 23:31;代上 11:33)
2) 掃羅王的孫子(約拿單的兒子)米非波設的後代, 米非波設或稱為米力巴力 (代上 8:36,9:42)
3) 一位便雅憫人, 其子耶薛和毗力在洗革拉投入大衛的麾下 (代上 12:3)
4) 大衛王時負責掌管皇家府庫的人(代上 27:25)
專有名詞 地名
5) 一處屬便雅憫支派的地方; 又稱 "伯亞斯瑪弗" (尼 7:28) 或 "亞斯瑪弗" (拉 2:24)
6) 耶路撒冷附近的一個田野或墾植地 (押瑪弗 #尼 12:28)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚斯玛威 或 押斯玛弗 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "一生刚毅, 至死方休"
阳性专有名词
1) 大卫王的大能勇士之一(撒下 23:31;代上 11:33)
2) 扫罗王的孙子(约拿单的儿子)米非波设的后代, 米非波设或称为米力巴力 (代上 8:36,9:42)
3) 一位便雅悯人, 其子耶薛和毗力在洗革拉投入大卫的麾下 (代上 12:3)
4) 大卫王时负责掌管皇家府库的人(代上 27:25)
专有名词 地名
5) 一处属便雅悯支派的地方; 又称 "伯亚斯玛弗" (尼 7:28) 或 "亚斯玛弗" (拉 2:24)
6) 耶路撒冷附近的一个田野或垦植地 (押玛弗 #尼 12:28)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.36;
son of: Jehoaddah (H3085);
brother of: Alemeth (H5964I) and Zimri (H2174H)
§ Azmaveth = "strong unto death"
n pr m
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a descendant of Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan and grandson of king Saul
3) a Benjamite, father of Jeziel and Pelet who were two of David's men who joined him at Ziklag
4) overseer of the royal treasures in the reign of David
n pr loc
5) a place in Benjamin; also 'Beth-azmeveth'

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.3;
father of: Jeziel (H3149), Pelet (H6404H)
§ Azmaveth = "strong unto death"
n pr m
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a descendant of Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan and grandson of king Saul
3) a Benjamite, father of Jeziel and Pelet who were two of David's men who joined him at Ziklag
4) overseer of the royal treasures in the reign of David
n pr loc
5) a place in Benjamin; also 'Beth-azmeveth'

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.25;
son of: Adiel (H5717I)
§ Azmaveth = "strong unto death"
n pr m
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a descendant of Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan and grandson of king Saul
3) a Benjamite, father of Jeziel and Pelet who were two of David's men who joined him at Ziklag
4) overseer of the royal treasures in the reign of David
n pr loc
5) a place in Benjamin; also 'Beth-azmeveth'

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of bet az.ma.vet (בֵּית־עַזְמָ֫וֶת "Beth-azmaveth" H1041)
§ Azmaveth = "strong unto death"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) one of David's mighty warriors
2) a descendant of Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan and grandson of king Saul
3) a Benjamite, father of Jeziel and Pelet who were two of David's men who joined him at Ziklag
4) overseer of the royal treasures in the reign of David
n pr loc
5) a place in Benjamin; also 'Beth-azmeveth'
